files.content: import { DatabaseIcon } from "lucide-react" import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, BreadcrumbLink, BreadcrumbList, BreadcrumbSeparator, } from "@/components/ui/breadcrumb" import { Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue, } from "@/components/ui/select" export default function Component() { return ( Databases ) }
